definitions.definition: On occasion : at relatively infrequent intervals , from time to time , sometimes .
On an occasion , accidentally , by chance .
On the occasion of something else happening; incidentally , by the way .

main_definition: On occasion : at relatively infrequent intervals , from time to time , sometimes . [from 15th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) On an occasion , accidentally , by chance . [17th–18th c.]
( obsolete ) On the occasion of something else happening; incidentally , by the way . [15th–18th c.]
